headline: Lorain County girls basketball All-Star Game set for March 13
author: Mark Perez-Krywany
sentences: “We are excited to have the All Star game returning and look forward to an amazing show of talent from our Lorain County Seniors and Rising Stars!,” Rangers coach and co-president of the Lorain County Girls Basketball Coaches Association Amy Esser said in a statement.
For the first time in two years, the Lorain County Girls Basketball All-Star Game will take place.
The event will be held in North Ridgeville High School on March 13.
